Thanks for the upload, but I open the zbrush generate the request code, open keygen, and when i enter the request code it says invalid.

Okay so it worked once, activated, and now it isn't working again. It's the generation of the code on the phone activation screen that appears to be the problem. It's supposed to generate a 20 character code, but typically generates 8. This is why the keygen gives that 'invalid' error. 

If anyone knows how to get the phone activation screen to generate the 20 character code, the problem will likely be fixed. Cheers.

Oh, I hate noobs. Reading their useless comments took longer than download, instal and start using program... And believe me, I am fast reader.

But I am generous man, I can teach them, can't I?


1. Click green "DOWLOAD THIS TORRENT" link.
2. Start download using your favorite torrent program (it's ÂµTorrent, isn't it?).
3. Go look through your window, examine the sky. The sky is nice today, isn't it?
4. Go back to your computer and open the folder downloaded where you downloaded this amaziness. (note: If it's not downloaded yet, curse your internet service provider for about 5-10 minutes. That should do it. If not, you might have to curse it for the rest of the day.)
5. Use your favorite selection method to SELECT ALL files in that folder.
6. Deselect first two files, that are named: "file_id.diz" and "x-force.nfo".
7. CLICK and HOLD RIGHT mouse button on selected items and drag them a bit to side.
8. From opened menu chose EXTRACT HERE, using your favorite program (7-zip?) and method.
9. Start to clap your hands rapidly and try to break a world record of "CLAPPING HANDS WHILE EXTRACTING "PIXOLOGIC_ZBRUSH_V4.0-XFORCE" ".ZIP" FILES". My personal record was 20 claps.
10. Select single file "zb4win.rar" and "EXTRACT" it "HERE" using any method you like.
11. You can try break a world clapping record here too, or you can go to look at your ole buddy sky.
12. If for some reason you fail to read and understand "install.txt", located in "Crack" folder, contact your doctor or pharmacist for advice.

PROBLEM:
Getting a message "Zscript note" Unrecognized command.
Click OK
Crash

FIX:
Go into Zbrush 4.0 directory,startup directory
Zscript directory
rename defaults script to "XXXdefaultscript" then enter
start ZBrush 4.0 as usual
Zbrush 4.0 will display a message stating it can find the defaults script
press ok
the program should be working correctly at this point.

The application is good and functional; thank you to the uploaded for sharing this, we appreciate it.

Now, on the other hand... *Once a file is compressed, you cannot compress it any further!* 
How hard is that to understand?
How much effort is required to *Compare* file sizes before an after? 
The only reason for compressing an EXE generally is to break it into small chunks, not to actually compress it. The installer is already compressed. To compress that again after separating it into 50 pieces already is outright imbecilic. 

I know it's not hard to extract it twice but it's still fucking annoying, especially when it happens with every third torrent.
